name: Who will make you a Millionaire?
name_original: Who will make you a Millionaire?
description:
"Who will make you a Millionaire" is the weirdest quiz you'll ever encounter. Instead of choosing your answers you must browse through phones of other people to find out a fitting candidate to answer for you.

Can you select the right person to make you a millionaire?

This game was made within 7 or 8 hours for GMTK Gam Jam 2020.

While it's still far from being finished I like the concept and I am always open for feedback.
